Great Barrier Reef, 2020. After a dangerous dive to save his 
wife Laura trapped while exploring an colonial British merchant 
ship wreckage, Jay Fennel, a rugged and attractive marine archeologist 
lies brain dead in a Boston hospital. Fennel's dream-like coma takes 
us back in time to Pune, India in 1778. The British East India 
Company is invading the palaces and a young captain named James 
Stewart, who bears a striking resemblance to Fennel, is about to 
embark on a dangerous mission. Along the way he encounters murder, 
deceit, betrayal and revenge. He falls deeply in love with an Indian 
She-warrior named Tulaja, an impossible love which he must fight for. 
Only the power of a ring can transcend time and save a life.
